name: Magic 102.7 FM
description: Inter Island Communication's MAGIC 102.7 FM RADIO was launched in 2007. The Music format and general programming incorporates Adult Contemporary and Old School music genres & talk programs, and a weekly Latin/Salsa show on Saturday evenings and Sunday church programs and inspirational content.

name: Ocean 89
description: A Bermudian radio station offering top-40 music, including the ongoing celebration of local artists. On air personalities are Keevil [The Captain] Burgess and Felix Todd.

name: Irie FM
description: Irie is Bermuda's # 1 and only Reggae station. We are the home of Reggae in Bermuda.

name: POWER 95 FM
description: POWER 95 FM is the BIG Station in Bermuda for HipHop, R&B, OldSchool and Reggae.

name: Hott FM
